psalm.title: Psalms

first_reading.text:
[[2_Tm 1,1]]Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God for the promise of life in Christ Jesus,
[[2_Tm 1,2]]to Timothy, my dear child: grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
[[2_Tm 1,3]]I am grateful to God, whom I worship with a clear conscience as my ancestors did, as I remember you constantly in my prayers, night and day.
[[2_Tm 1,4]]I yearn to see you again, recalling your tears, so that I may be filled with joy,
[[2_Tm 1,5]]as I recall your sincere faith that first lived in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice and that I am confident lives also in you.
[[2_Tm 1,6]]For this reason, I remind you to stir into flame the gift of God that you have through the imposition of my hands.
[[2_Tm 1,7]]For God did not give us a spirit of cowardice but rather of power and love and self-control.
[[2_Tm 1,8]]So do not be ashamed of your testimony to our Lord, nor of me, a prisoner for his sake; but bear your share of hardship for the gospel with the strength that comes from God.
first_reading.title: Second Letter to Timothy

gospel.text:
[[Lc 10,1]]The Lord Jesus appointed seventy-two others whom he sent ahead of him in pairs to every town and place he intended to visit.
[[Lc 10,2]]He said to them, "The harvest is abundant but the laborers are few; so ask the master of the harvest to send out laborers for his harvest.
[[Lc 10,3]]Go on your way; behold, I am sending you like lambs among wolves.
[[Lc 10,4]]Carry no money bag, no sack, no sandals; and greet no one along the way.
[[Lc 10,5]]Into whatever house you enter, first say, 'Peace to this household.'
[[Lc 10,6]]If a peaceful person lives there, your peace will rest on him; but if not, it will return to you.
[[Lc 10,7]]Stay in the same house and eat and drink what is offered to you, for the laborer deserves his payment. Do not move about from one house to another.
[[Lc 10,8]]Whatever town you enter and they welcome you, eat what is set before you,
[[Lc 10,9]]cure the sick in it and say to them, 'The kingdom of God is at hand for you.'"
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
